features.name: Pack Tactics
features.text: If another Dire Wolf is in Melee, standard attack deals 1d6+5 phy instead and you gain 1 Fear.

features.name: Hobbling Strike
features.text: Make attack (Melee). On success, deal 3d4+10 direct phy and target is Vulnerable until they clear 1 HP.

features.name: Shield Wall
features.text: Creatures trying to move within Very Close range must succeed on an Agility Roll.

features.name: Detain
features.text: Attack (Very Close). On success, Restrain target.

features.name: Opportunist
features.text: If two or more adversaries are within Very Close range of target, all damage is doubled.

features.name: Deadly Shot
features.text: Attack (Far) vs. Vulnerable target. On success, deal 3d4+8 phy.

features.name: Ramp Up
features.text: Must spend a Fear to spotlight. Can attack all targets in range.

features.name: Hail of Boulders
features.text: Attack all targets in front (Far). On success, 1d10+2 phy.
